TopicTitle: How about making a Kerbal FPS?

Articles.Content: I am just interested, would it be possible to make a FPS set on Kerbin including RP nations but also new ones. I mean, RP events such as the Medwedian Crisis but also imaginary stuff like the army of KSC2 attacking KSC1.

would it be possible

Yes. Just mod an existing FPS game.
